Module ActiveRbacMixins::ApplicationControllerMixin
In: vendor/plugins/active_rbac/lib/active_rbac_mixins/application_controller_mixin.rb

Mix this module into your ApplicationController to get the "current_user" method which returns the User instance of the currently logged in user.
